qas.question: When did Kerry consider running for president if Droney didn't?
When did Kerry leave the DA's office?
Who left the DA's office with Kerry?
Who did Kerry start a bakery with?

context: Droney's health was poor and Kerry had decided to run for his position in the <a0_0>1978<a0_0/> election should Droney drop out. However, Droney was re-elected and his health improved; he went on to re-assume many of the duties that he had delegated to Kerry. Kerry thus decided to leave, departing in <a1_0>1979<a1_0/> with assistant DA <a2_0>Roanne Sragow<a2_0/> to set up their own law firm. Kerry also worked as a commentator for WCVB-TV and co-founded a bakery, <a3_0>Kilvert & Forbes Ltd.<a3_0/>, with businessman and former Kennedy aide <a4_0>K. Dun Gifford<a4_0/>.
